analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Sekhassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appattamānasassa anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamānassa
analyzed: sekhassa bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ appatta mānasassa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamānassa

original: viharato ajjhattikaṁ aṅganti karitvā nāññaṁ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ bahūpakāraṁ
analyzed: viharataḥ ajjhattikam aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam bahu upakāra

original: Yoniso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasi karonto akusalaṁ pajahati, kusalaṁ bhāvetī”ti.
analyzed: yonisaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu manasi karontaḥ akusalam pajahati kusalam bhāveti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
